CustomField.description: All user story feature branches are created out of the main branch of the Deployment Flow. If a Release base branch is specified, all feature branches of user stories linked to the Release will be created out of the base branch.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: All user story feature branches are created out of the main branch of the Deployment Flow. If a Release base branch is specified, all feature branches of user stories linked to the Release will be created out of the base branch.
CustomField.label: Base Branch
